posts.post_title: FS/FT: N172 Stemmyer - Cleveland - SGC 60, a Tintype, & a Jim McAleer Cabinet Photo
posts.post_content:
Stemmyer - SGC 60 - $475 net to me OBO - tough Cleveland pose
[IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=150&pictureid=28236[/IMG]
Price includes insured shipping

Stemmyer only played in 3 games for Cleveland in 1888 then was cut from the team after his arm was done.  His Boston cards are much easier to obtain than his Cleveland poses.  


[IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=150&pictureid=28239[/IMG][IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=150&pictureid=28240[/IMG]

Tintype - possibly a baseball player.  Its old, its a tintype, thats all I know.  Could be a player.  Could be just about any other profession.  Almost looks like home plate by his feet in background. $75 net to me delivered and you takes your chances.

Also willing to trade for other Old Judges or other cards on my wantlist.  Email with any questions.  Thanks for looking.  References and better scans available upon request.

Eric

to add scans and several more cards.

Eric
